name: Steal(th)
description:
Hi!

Game made for the #mizjam1 48h game jam.  Made in 29h 39m.

Hope you like it as much as I liked making it! Feel free to comment what you think, feedbacks are always welcome! :)

Controls

  • Left arrow, Right arrow - move
  • Up arrow - jump and double jump
  • Shift - Power up 1
  • Space - Power up 2
  • Enter - Power up 3

Note

You must collect the power up to be able to activate it

To open doors, you must collect the key with the matching color
